21019001-null-.name: Muros Studio
21019001-null-.uiDescription: It's the first day of filming, but the big star is nowhere to be found! Time is short, and the director is desparate to find a replacement actor. This is your chance to make your TV debut, and take a shot at stardom! Will you step into the spotlight?

21023001-PirateOcean-.name: Guardian of the Seas
21023001-PirateOcean-.uiDescription: The reclusive guardian's call reverberates from the depths of the ocean. Seized by a dark rage, he bellows in warning. What exactly is he trying to tell the humans above?

21022001-PirateOcean-.name: The Song of the Oracle
21022001-PirateOcean-.uiDescription: The siren sisters who dwell upon $map:02000391$ are said to be as beautiful as their song. But the sudden influx of unwelcome guests has filled them with rage. Placate them and learn what they know of the message coming from the ocean.

21025001-DarkCastle-.name: Madrakan's Heart
21025001-DarkCastle-.uiDescription: A small crack can grow and eventually lead to the downfall of an impenetrable fortress. The Maple Alliance has put together an elite team to invade Madrakan. It's time to end one of the greatest threats to the Maple Alliance!

21024001-DarkCastle-.name: Madrakan Ramparts
21024001-DarkCastle-.uiDescription: The siege of Madrakan, the stronghold of Madria, has begun! The Maple Alliance has it surrounded, but its thick castle walls are preventing entry. The only way to conquer Madrakan now is to somehow storm the gateway—a task for a true hero!

21026001-DarkCastle-.name: Chateau of Grief
21026001-DarkCastle-.uiDescription: A huge manor has been discovered at one corner of the Shadow Gate. It's deserted, but there's a malicious aura all around it. What happened in there, so long ago?

21021001-SnowKingdom-.name: Icethorn Ridge
21021001-SnowKingdom-.uiDescription: It is said that at the foot of a mountain, hidden within a raging snowstorm, a secret path to a lost kingdom awaits. The path appears to precious few, and those who see it are frightened away by a terrifying cry. Who or what could be hiding there?

23024003-SnowKingdom-.name: Normal Frostpillar Temple
23024003-SnowKingdom-.uiDescription:
A temple to a lost kingdom. A dark shadow that stands watch. No adventurer has ever survived long enough to uncover the temple's secrets...

20016002-null-.name: Labyrinthine Halls
20016002-null-.uiDescription:
Nazkar Temple was once the home of the dragons known as the Guides of Light. Ages have passed since the dragons vanished, and rumors are swirling that darkness gathers in their absence. What lies within the shadows engulfing Nazkar?

<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font>
<font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

24090004-CrimsonBalrog01-.name: Wrath of Infernog
24090004-CrimsonBalrog01-.uiDescription:
Infernog, the great immortal monarch has finally awoken. The only way to stop this ancient, immortal balrog is to use the Sky Fortress's ultimate weapon to blast him into outer space.

<font color='#00aaef'>Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font>
<font color='#00aaef'>When Infernog descends from his ship, player revival will be restricted.</font>
<font color='#00aaef'>Special items are required to fight against Infernog:</font>
<font color='#00aaef'>$item:20000762$, $item:20000763$</font> (Sold by the Goods Quartermaster)
<font color='#FFD400'>A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

24096001-Colosseum01-.name: Queen Bean Arena
24096001-Colosseum01-.uiDescription: $npcName:11004285$, queen of the Pink Beans, has descended upon Maple World! The $npcName:11004285$ Rumble is a tournament between Maple World's craziest heroes.
